sourcesContent:
<style src="./HtmlView.css"></style>
<template src="./HtmlView.html"></template>
<script>
    import ViewtitleComponent from '@/components/ViewtitleComponent/ViewtitleComponent.vue';
    import NavigatorComponent from '@/components/NavigatorComponent/NavigatorComponent.vue';

    export default {
        name: "HtmlView",
        inject: ["GDATA"],
        components: {
            ViewtitleComponent,
            NavigatorComponent
        },
        data() {
            return {
                navigator: [
                    {
                        "strname": "Главная",
                        "link": "html",
                        "list": []
                    },
                    {
                        "strname": "Учебный курс",
                        "link": "",
                        "list": [
                            {
                                "title": "Предисловие"
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                ],
            }
        },
        computed: {
            AGDATA: function () {
                return this.GDATA.html;
            },
            COLORDATA: function () {
                return this.GDATA.colors;
            },
        },
        methods: {
            chgVisiblStatus(elId) {
                var el = document.getElementById(elId);
                el.style.display = el.style.display === 'none' ? 'block' : 'none';
            }
        }
    }
</script>
